About Me

I have spent over 8 years in the software industry working with diverse engineering team to craft awesome digital experience for clients.

I have firm knowledge of the software development life cycle and a strong work ethic in getting things done with little or no supervision.

Currently, I am utilizing my expertise, communication, problem solving and technical skills to thrive as a top notch front end software engineer

Crime Hood

Creating A Safer Neighbourhood.

About The Project

CrimeHood empowers citizens to report crimes anywhere in their locality!

Why This Project ?

The objective is to create a safer community and encourage public participation in crime reporting

Technologies Used

  • Google Map Apis
  • Reach Combo Box
  • Snazzy Maps
  • React JS

budgetn

Experience a fresh way to manage money

About Project

Budgetn allows users to keep track on how much money they have available by recording every income and expenditure

Why This Project

Allow uses to monitor and improve their spending habbits

Technologies Used

  • Firebase FireStore
  • Firebase Authentication
  • React JS

Lip Sync

Unveil your favourite artiste

About Project

Lip Sync empowers music lovers to discover everything they need to know about their favourite artiste

Why This Project

Provide a large collection of artiste database for music enthusiast to quickly discover all they need to know about their artiste

Technologies Used

  • Music Database API
  • React JS

View Project

Where Next?

Explore the beautiful city of Accra

About This Project

This project allows first time visitors to Accra, Ghana's capital to quickly view interesting tourist sites dotted in the capital

Why This Project

To serve as a one-stop place for tourist to get the location of all the interesting places to visit in Accra

Technologies Used

  • Google Maps Api
  • React JS

View Project

Tip.sy

Chill your glasses ahead of time

About The Project

A one-stop-point to search for your favourite cocktail and delight your senses

Why The Project

Allow cocktail lovers to quickly search for a cocktail and get all the ingredients needed to make the favourite cocktail

Technologies Used

  • Cocktail Database API
  • React JS
